quote: Photography is without mercy--though it's nonsense to say it does not lie. Rather, it lies in a particular, capricious way which makes beggars of ministers and gods of cat's meat men.
quote_letters: PHOTOGRAPHY IS WITHOUT MERCY--THOUGH ITS NONSENSE TO SAY IT DOES NOT LIE RATHER IT LIES IN A PARTICULAR CAPRICIOUS WAY WHICH MAKES BEGGARS OF MINISTERS AND GODS OF CATS MEAT MEN
